name: Warm Up Tonight, Light Your Dynamite
name_original: Warm Up Tonight, Light Your Dynamite
description:
No warmth, no aid, and no clue where you are. All you know is that it's effing cold outside, and dynamite is your blanket tonight. But beware, you might not be the only thing lurking out there.
How to Play
Must play with an Xbox controller
Use headphones and enjoy the custom sound
Left Thumb Stick - move player
Right Thumb Stick – change player's viewpoint
Right Bumper - throw a stick of dynamite (Don't get caught in the blast!)
Use TNT to set trees on fire and stay warm
Credits
Program Lead – Stefano Della Croce
Design Lead – Filipe Seabra
Visual Programming Lead – Olexiy Zhukov-Malyeyev
Art Lead – Katherine Elliott
Sound Lead – PJ Tremblay
